text: Egh kɨ Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn mangɨ Godɨn damazimɨn deraghtɨ, eghtɨ Kraisɨn ovevem mati pura bizim. Ezɨ God uan arazir Moses ganɨngizibar gɨn mangan gumazibar anogoroke. Me dar gɨn mangɨva Godɨn damazimɨn deraghan kogham. Kamaghɨn kɨ Godɨn apangkuvim damightɨ a pura bizir kɨnimɨn mɨn otivan, kɨ aghua.”
